code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate,createSearchParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Navbar(){const[q,setQ]=useState("");const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const onSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!q.trim())return;navigate({pathname:"/search",search:"?".concat(createSearchParams({query:q.trim()}))});setQ("");setMenuOpen(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",className:"brand",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-icons icon",children:"movie"})," MovieBox"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,className:"search",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search movies...",value:q,onChange:e=>setQ(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-icons",children:"search"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"hamburger",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(!menuOpen),"aria-label":"Toggle menu",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-icons",children:menuOpen?"close":"menu"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navlinks ".concat(menuOpen?"open":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:"Popular"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/top-rated",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:"Top Rated"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/upcoming",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:"Upcoming"})]})]});}
